document_data.caption: A map of Silla showing the location of the Hoparatu River.
document_data.name: Hoparatu River
document_data.mainbody: The '''Hoparatu River''' was a river in the kingdom of [[Koryo]] in [[Kara-Tur]].
document_data.Geography: Found on the eastern edge of Koryo, the Hoparatu River began in the [[Quang Muku Forest]] then ran through the southern foothills of the [[Vorkani Mountains]]. Joining another river from the Vorkani Mountains, it emptied into the sea at [[Xi Hulang]].
document_data.Settlements: The town of [[Goisho]] stood on the western part of the river, while the capital city of Xi Hulang lay its mouth.
